CREATE TABLE "keys" ("address" varchar(64),"json" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("address"))

CREATE TABLE "run_results" ("id" serial,"data" text,"status" text,"error_message" text,"amount" varchar(255) , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "task_specs" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id),"type" text NOT NULL,"confirmations" bigint,"params" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "tx_attempts" ("hash" bytea NOT NULL,"tx_id" bigint,"gas_price" varchar(255),"confirmed" boolean,"hex" text,"sent_at" bigint,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("hash"))

CREATE TABLE "txes" ("id" bigserial,"from" bytea NOT NULL,"to" bytea NOT NULL,"data" bytea,"nonce" bigint,"value" varchar(255),"gas_limit" bigint,"hash" bytea,"gas_price" varchar(255),"confirmed" boolean,"hex" text,"sent_at" bigint , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "tx_attempts" ("id" bigserial,"tx_id" bigint REFERENCES txes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,"created_at" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"gas_price" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"confirmed" boolean NOT NULL,"sent_at" bigint NOT NULL,"signed_raw_tx" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
ALTER TABLE "task_runs" ADD "confirmations" bigint NOT NULL  DEFAULT  0;
CREATE TABLE "heads" ("id" bigserial,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"number" bigint NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "link_earned" ("id" bigserial NOT NULL,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL,"job_run_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_runs(id) NOT NULL UNIQUE,"earned" varchar(255),"earned_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

INSERT INTO link_earned
		SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY job_spec_id) AS id, job_spec_id, jr.id AS job_run_id, amount, finished_at
		FROM job_runs jr INNER JOIN run_results rr ON jr.overrides_id  = rr.id
		WHERE amount IS NOT NULL

	ALTER TABLE job_runs ALTER COLUMN initiator_id SET NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "absolute_threshold" float;

-- where one of the txes is confirmed, keep the latest confirmed one
		-- if none are confirmed, keep the latest one
		WITH duplicate_txes_by_nonce AS (
			SELECT nonce, "from"
			FROM txes
			GROUP BY nonce, "from"
			HAVING count(id) > 1
		),
		txes_to_keep AS (
			SELECT DISTINCT ON (txes.nonce) txes.nonce, id, confirmed, txes."from"
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			ORDER BY nonce, "from", confirmed desc, id desc
		),
		txes_to_delete AS (
			SELECT id
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_keep)
		)
		DELETE FROM txes WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_delete);

		DROP INDEX idx_txes_nonce;
	  	CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_txes_unique_nonces_per_account ON txes(nonce, "from");

CREATE TABLE migrations (id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY)

CREATE TABLE "bridge_types" ("name" text,"url" text,"confirmations" bigint,"incoming_token_hash" text,"salt" text,"outgoing_token" text,"minimum_contract_payment" varchar(255),"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("name"))
CREATE TABLE "encumbrances" ("id" serial,"payment" varchar(255),"expiration" bigint,"end_at" timestamp with time zone,"oracles" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"access_key" text,"salt" text,"hashed_secret" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "heads" ("hash" varchar,"number" bigint NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("hash"))

CREATE TABLE "job_specs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"start_at" timestamp with time zone,"end_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "initiators" ("id" serial,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id),"type" text NOT NULL,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"schedule" text,"time" timestamp with time zone,"ran" boolean,"address" bytea,"requesters" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "job_runs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL,"result_id" integer,"run_request_id" integer,"status" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"finished_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"initiator_id" integer,"creation_height" varchar(255),"observed_height" varchar(255),"overrides_id" integer,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "keys" ("address" varchar(64),"json" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("address"))
CREATE TABLE "run_requests" ("id" serial,"request_id" text,"tx_hash" bytea,"requester" bytea,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "run_results" ("id" serial,"data" text,"status" text,"error_message" text,"amount" varchar(255) , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "service_agreements" ("id" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"encumbrance_id" integer,"request_body" text,"signature" varchar(255),"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "sessions" ("id" text,"last_used" timestamp with time zone,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "sync_events" ("id" bigserial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"body" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "task_runs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"job_run_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_runs(id) ON DELETE CASCADE NOT NULL,"result_id" integer,"status" text,"task_spec_id" integer,"minimum_confirmations" bigint,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "task_specs" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id),"type" text NOT NULL,"confirmations" bigint,"params" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "tx_attempts" ("hash" bytea NOT NULL,"tx_id" bigint,"gas_price" varchar(255),"confirmed" boolean,"hex" text,"sent_at" bigint,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("hash"))

CREATE TABLE "txes" ("id" bigserial,"from" bytea NOT NULL,"to" bytea NOT NULL,"data" bytea,"nonce" bigint,"value" varchar(255),"gas_limit" bigint,"hash" bytea,"gas_price" varchar(255),"confirmed" boolean,"hex" text,"sent_at" bigint , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "users" ("email" text,"hashed_password" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"token_key" text,"token_salt" text,"token_hashed_secret" text,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("email"))

CREATE TABLE "txes" ("id" bigserial,"surrogate_id" text UNIQUE,"from" bytea NOT NULL,"to" bytea NOT NULL,"data" bytea NOT NULL,"nonce" bigint NOT NULL,"value" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"gas_limit" bigint NOT NULL,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"gas_price" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"confirmed" boolean NOT NULL,"sent_at" bigint NOT NULL,"signed_raw_tx" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "tx_attempts" ("id" bigserial,"tx_id" bigint REFERENCES txes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,"created_at" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"gas_price" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"confirmed" boolean NOT NULL,"sent_at" bigint NOT NULL,"signed_raw_tx" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
ALTER TABLE "task_runs" ADD "confirmations" bigint NOT NULL  DEFAULT  0;
CREATE TABLE "heads" ("id" bigserial,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"number" bigint NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "link_earned" ("id" bigserial NOT NULL,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL,"job_run_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_runs(id) NOT NULL UNIQUE,"earned" varchar(255),"earned_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

INSERT INTO link_earned
		SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY job_spec_id) AS id, job_spec_id, jr.id AS job_run_id, amount, finished_at
		FROM job_runs jr INNER JOIN run_results rr ON jr.overrides_id  = rr.id
		WHERE amount IS NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE job_specs ADD min_payment varchar(255)

CREATE TABLE "configurations" ("id" bigserial,"name" text NOT NULL UNIQUE,"value" text NOT NULL,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

ALTER TABLE run_results DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS cached_job_run_id;
ALTER TABLE run_results DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS cached_task_run_id;

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"name" text,"url" text NOT NULL,"access_key" text NOT NULL,"salt" text NOT NULL,"hashed_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_token" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD name varchar(255)

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"name" text NOT NULL UNIQUE,"url" text NOT NULL,"access_key" text NOT NULL,"salt" text NOT NULL,"hashed_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_token" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "encumbrances" ("id" serial,"payment" varchar(255),"expiration" bigint,"end_at" timestamp with time zone,"oracles" text,"aggregator" text NOT NULL,"agg_initiate_job_selector" bytea NOT NULL,"agg_fulfill_selector" bytea NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"name" text NOT NULL UNIQUE,"url" text,"access_key" text NOT NULL,"salt" text NOT NULL,"hashed_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_token" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "polling_interval" BigInt;
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "idle_threshold" BigInt;
ALTER TABLE run_requests ADD request_params text NOT NULL DEFAULT '{}'

UPDATE run_requests
			SET request_params = job_runs.overrides
			FROM job_runs
			WHERE job_runs.run_request_id = run_requests.id AND job_runs.overrides IS NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE job_runs DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS overrides
CREATE TABLE "log_cursors" ("name" text,"initialized" boolean NOT NULL,"block_index" integer NOT NULL,"log_index" integer NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("name"))
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_task_runs_job_run_id ON task_runs(job_run_id);

DROP INDEX idx_job_runs_status;
	CREATE INDEX idx_job_runs_status ON job_runs(status) WHERE status != 'completed';
ALTER TABLE initiators ALTER COLUMN job_spec_id TYPE uuid USING job_spec_id::uuid;

DELETE FROM job_runs WHERE initiator_id IS NULL;
	ALTER TABLE job_runs ALTER COLUMN initiator_id SET NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "absolute_threshold" float;

-- where one of the txes is confirmed, keep the latest confirmed one
		-- if none are confirmed, keep the latest one
		WITH duplicate_txes_by_nonce AS (
			SELECT nonce, "from"
			FROM txes
			GROUP BY nonce, "from"
			HAVING count(id) > 1
		),
		txes_to_keep AS (
			SELECT DISTINCT ON (txes.nonce) txes.nonce, id, confirmed, txes."from"
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			ORDER BY nonce, "from", confirmed desc, id desc
		),
		txes_to_delete AS (
			SELECT id
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_keep)
		)
		DELETE FROM txes WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_delete);

		DROP INDEX idx_txes_nonce;
	  	CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_txes_unique_nonces_per_account ON txes(nonce, "from");

CREATE TABLE flux_monitor_round_stats (
            id bigserial primary key,
            aggregator bytea not null,
            round_id integer not null,
            num_new_round_logs integer not null default 0,
            num_submissions integer not null default 0,

            UNIQUE (aggregator, round_id)
        )
ALTER TABLE keys ADD COLUMN last_used timestamptz;

ALTER TABLE keys ALTER COLUMN next_nonce DROP NOT NULL;

ALTER TABLE flux_monitor_round_stats ADD COLUMN "job_run_id" uuid REFERENCES job_runs(id) ON DELETE CASCADE;

CREATE TABLE migrations (id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY)

CREATE TABLE "bridge_types" ("name" text,"url" text,"confirmations" bigint,"incoming_token_hash" text,"salt" text,"outgoing_token" text,"minimum_contract_payment" varchar(255),"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("name"))
CREATE TABLE "encumbrances" ("id" serial,"payment" varchar(255),"expiration" bigint,"end_at" timestamp with time zone,"oracles" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"access_key" text,"salt" text,"hashed_secret" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "heads" ("hash" varchar,"number" bigint NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("hash"))

CREATE TABLE "job_specs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"start_at" timestamp with time zone,"end_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "initiators" ("id" serial,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id),"type" text NOT NULL,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"schedule" text,"time" timestamp with time zone,"ran" boolean,"address" bytea,"requesters" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "job_runs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL,"result_id" integer,"run_request_id" integer,"status" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"finished_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"initiator_id" integer,"creation_height" varchar(255),"observed_height" varchar(255),"overrides_id" integer,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "keys" ("address" varchar(64),"json" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("address"))
CREATE TABLE "run_requests" ("id" serial,"request_id" text,"tx_hash" bytea,"requester" bytea,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "run_results" ("id" serial,"data" text,"status" text,"error_message" text,"amount" varchar(255) , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "service_agreements" ("id" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"encumbrance_id" integer,"request_body" text,"signature" varchar(255),"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "sessions" ("id" text,"last_used" timestamp with time zone,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "sync_events" ("id" bigserial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"body" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "task_runs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"job_run_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_runs(id) ON DELETE CASCADE NOT NULL,"result_id" integer,"status" text,"task_spec_id" integer,"minimum_confirmations" bigint,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "task_specs" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id),"type" text NOT NULL,"confirmations" bigint,"params" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "tx_attempts" ("hash" bytea NOT NULL,"tx_id" bigint,"gas_price" varchar(255),"confirmed" boolean,"hex" text,"sent_at" bigint,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("hash"))

CREATE TABLE "txes" ("id" bigserial,"from" bytea NOT NULL,"to" bytea NOT NULL,"data" bytea,"nonce" bigint,"value" varchar(255),"gas_limit" bigint,"hash" bytea,"gas_price" varchar(255),"confirmed" boolean,"hex" text,"sent_at" bigint , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "users" ("email" text,"hashed_password" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"token_key" text,"token_salt" text,"token_hashed_secret" text,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("email"))

CREATE TABLE "txes" ("id" bigserial,"surrogate_id" text UNIQUE,"from" bytea NOT NULL,"to" bytea NOT NULL,"data" bytea NOT NULL,"nonce" bigint NOT NULL,"value" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"gas_limit" bigint NOT NULL,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"gas_price" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"confirmed" boolean NOT NULL,"sent_at" bigint NOT NULL,"signed_raw_tx" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "tx_attempts" ("id" bigserial,"tx_id" bigint REFERENCES txes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,"created_at" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"gas_price" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"confirmed" boolean NOT NULL,"sent_at" bigint NOT NULL,"signed_raw_tx" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
ALTER TABLE "task_runs" ADD "confirmations" bigint NOT NULL  DEFAULT  0;
CREATE TABLE "heads" ("id" bigserial,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"number" bigint NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "link_earned" ("id" bigserial NOT NULL,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL,"job_run_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_runs(id) NOT NULL UNIQUE,"earned" varchar(255),"earned_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

INSERT INTO link_earned
		SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY job_spec_id) AS id, job_spec_id, jr.id AS job_run_id, amount, finished_at
		FROM job_runs jr INNER JOIN run_results rr ON jr.overrides_id  = rr.id
		WHERE amount IS NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE job_specs ADD min_payment varchar(255)

CREATE TABLE "configurations" ("id" bigserial,"name" text NOT NULL UNIQUE,"value" text NOT NULL,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

ALTER TABLE run_results DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS cached_job_run_id;
ALTER TABLE run_results DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS cached_task_run_id;

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"name" text,"url" text NOT NULL,"access_key" text NOT NULL,"salt" text NOT NULL,"hashed_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_token" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "polling_interval" BigInt;
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "idle_threshold" BigInt;

UPDATE run_requests
			SET request_params = job_runs.overrides
			FROM job_runs
			WHERE job_runs.run_request_id = run_requests.id AND job_runs.overrides IS NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE job_runs DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS overrides

	CREATE INDEX idx_job_runs_status ON job_runs(status) WHERE status != 'completed';
ALTER TABLE initiators ALTER COLUMN job_spec_id TYPE uuid USING job_spec_id::uuid;

DELETE FROM job_runs WHERE initiator_id IS NULL;
	ALTER TABLE job_runs ALTER COLUMN initiator_id SET NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "absolute_threshold" float;

-- where one of the txes is confirmed, keep the latest confirmed one
		-- if none are confirmed, keep the latest one
		WITH duplicate_txes_by_nonce AS (
			SELECT nonce, "from"
			FROM txes
			GROUP BY nonce, "from"
			HAVING count(id) > 1
		),
		txes_to_keep AS (
			SELECT DISTINCT ON (txes.nonce) txes.nonce, id, confirmed, txes."from"
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			ORDER BY nonce, "from", confirmed desc, id desc
		),
		txes_to_delete AS (
			SELECT id
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_keep)
		)
		DELETE FROM txes WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_delete);

		DROP INDEX idx_txes_nonce;
	  	CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_txes_unique_nonces_per_account ON txes(nonce, "from");

            UNIQUE (aggregator, round_id)
        )

CREATE TABLE migrations (id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY)

CREATE TABLE "bridge_types" ("name" text,"url" text,"confirmations" bigint,"incoming_token_hash" text,"salt" text,"outgoing_token" text,"minimum_contract_payment" varchar(255),"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("name"))
CREATE TABLE "encumbrances" ("id" serial,"payment" varchar(255),"expiration" bigint,"end_at" timestamp with time zone,"oracles" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"access_key" text,"salt" text,"hashed_secret" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "heads" ("hash" varchar,"number" bigint NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("hash"))

CREATE TABLE "job_specs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"start_at" timestamp with time zone,"end_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "initiators" ("id" serial,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id),"type" text NOT NULL,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"schedule" text,"time" timestamp with time zone,"ran" boolean,"address" bytea,"requesters" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "job_runs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL,"result_id" integer,"run_request_id" integer,"status" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"finished_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"initiator_id" integer,"creation_height" varchar(255),"observed_height" varchar(255),"overrides_id" integer,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "keys" ("address" varchar(64),"json" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("address"))
CREATE TABLE "run_requests" ("id" serial,"request_id" text,"tx_hash" bytea,"requester" bytea,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "run_results" ("id" serial,"data" text,"status" text,"error_message" text,"amount" varchar(255) , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "service_agreements" ("id" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"encumbrance_id" integer,"request_body" text,"signature" varchar(255),"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "sessions" ("id" text,"last_used" timestamp with time zone,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "sync_events" ("id" bigserial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"body" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "task_runs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"job_run_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_runs(id) ON DELETE CASCADE NOT NULL,"result_id" integer,"status" text,"task_spec_id" integer,"minimum_confirmations" bigint,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "task_specs" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id),"type" text NOT NULL,"confirmations" bigint,"params" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "tx_attempts" ("hash" bytea NOT NULL,"tx_id" bigint,"gas_price" varchar(255),"confirmed" boolean,"hex" text,"sent_at" bigint,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("hash"))

CREATE TABLE "txes" ("id" bigserial,"from" bytea NOT NULL,"to" bytea NOT NULL,"data" bytea,"nonce" bigint,"value" varchar(255),"gas_limit" bigint,"hash" bytea,"gas_price" varchar(255),"confirmed" boolean,"hex" text,"sent_at" bigint , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "users" ("email" text,"hashed_password" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"token_key" text,"token_salt" text,"token_hashed_secret" text,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("email"))

CREATE TABLE "txes" ("id" bigserial,"surrogate_id" text UNIQUE,"from" bytea NOT NULL,"to" bytea NOT NULL,"data" bytea NOT NULL,"nonce" bigint NOT NULL,"value" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"gas_limit" bigint NOT NULL,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"gas_price" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"confirmed" boolean NOT NULL,"sent_at" bigint NOT NULL,"signed_raw_tx" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "tx_attempts" ("id" bigserial,"tx_id" bigint REFERENCES txes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,"created_at" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"gas_price" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"confirmed" boolean NOT NULL,"sent_at" bigint NOT NULL,"signed_raw_tx" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
ALTER TABLE "task_runs" ADD "confirmations" bigint NOT NULL  DEFAULT  0;
CREATE TABLE "heads" ("id" bigserial,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"number" bigint NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "link_earned" ("id" bigserial NOT NULL,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL,"job_run_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_runs(id) NOT NULL UNIQUE,"earned" varchar(255),"earned_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

INSERT INTO link_earned
		SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY job_spec_id) AS id, job_spec_id, jr.id AS job_run_id, amount, finished_at
		FROM job_runs jr INNER JOIN run_results rr ON jr.overrides_id  = rr.id
		WHERE amount IS NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE job_specs ADD min_payment varchar(255)

CREATE TABLE "configurations" ("id" bigserial,"name" text NOT NULL UNIQUE,"value" text NOT NULL,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

ALTER TABLE run_results DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS cached_job_run_id;
ALTER TABLE run_results DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS cached_task_run_id;

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"name" text,"url" text NOT NULL,"access_key" text NOT NULL,"salt" text NOT NULL,"hashed_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_token" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD name varchar(255)

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"name" text NOT NULL UNIQUE,"url" text NOT NULL,"access_key" text NOT NULL,"salt" text NOT NULL,"hashed_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_token" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "encumbrances" ("id" serial,"payment" varchar(255),"expiration" bigint,"end_at" timestamp with time zone,"oracles" text,"aggregator" text NOT NULL,"agg_initiate_job_selector" bytea NOT NULL,"agg_fulfill_selector" bytea NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"name" text NOT NULL UNIQUE,"url" text,"access_key" text NOT NULL,"salt" text NOT NULL,"hashed_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_token" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "polling_interval" BigInt;
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "idle_threshold" BigInt;
ALTER TABLE run_requests ADD request_params text NOT NULL DEFAULT '{}'

UPDATE run_requests
			SET request_params = job_runs.overrides
			FROM job_runs
			WHERE job_runs.run_request_id = run_requests.id AND job_runs.overrides IS NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE job_runs DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS overrides
CREATE TABLE "log_cursors" ("name" text,"initialized" boolean NOT NULL,"block_index" integer NOT NULL,"log_index" integer NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("name"))
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_task_runs_job_run_id ON task_runs(job_run_id);

DROP INDEX idx_job_runs_status;
	CREATE INDEX idx_job_runs_status ON job_runs(status) WHERE status != 'completed';
ALTER TABLE initiators ALTER COLUMN job_spec_id TYPE uuid USING job_spec_id::uuid;

DELETE FROM job_runs WHERE initiator_id IS NULL;
	ALTER TABLE job_runs ALTER COLUMN initiator_id SET NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "absolute_threshold" float;

-- where one of the txes is confirmed, keep the latest confirmed one
		-- if none are confirmed, keep the latest one
		WITH duplicate_txes_by_nonce AS (
			SELECT nonce, "from"
			FROM txes
			GROUP BY nonce, "from"
			HAVING count(id) > 1
		),
		txes_to_keep AS (
			SELECT DISTINCT ON (txes.nonce) txes.nonce, id, confirmed, txes."from"
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			ORDER BY nonce, "from", confirmed desc, id desc
		),
		txes_to_delete AS (
			SELECT id
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_keep)
		)
		DELETE FROM txes WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_delete);

		DROP INDEX idx_txes_nonce;
	  	CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_txes_unique_nonces_per_account ON txes(nonce, "from");

CREATE TABLE flux_monitor_round_stats (
            id bigserial primary key,
            aggregator bytea not null,
            round_id integer not null,
            num_new_round_logs integer not null default 0,
            num_submissions integer not null default 0,

            UNIQUE (aggregator, round_id)
        )
ALTER TABLE keys ADD COLUMN last_used timestamptz;

ALTER TABLE keys ALTER COLUMN next_nonce DROP NOT NULL;
		ALTER TABLE keys ALTER COLUMN next_nonce SET DEFAULT NULL;
ALTER TABLE flux_monitor_round_stats ADD COLUMN "job_run_id" uuid REFERENCES job_runs(id) ON DELETE CASCADE;

ALTER TABLE log_consumptions
ADD COLUMN block_number BIGINT
CREATE INDEX idx_eth_txes_min_unconfirmed_nonce_for_key ON eth_txes (nonce, from_address) WHERE state = 'unconfirmed';

			off_chain_public_key bytea NOT NULL,
			encrypted_private_keys jsonb NOT NULL,
			created_at timestamptz NOT NULL,
			updated_at timestamptz NOT NULL
			);

CREATE TABLE migrations (id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY)

CREATE TABLE "bridge_types" ("name" text,"url" text,"confirmations" bigint,"incoming_token_hash" text,"salt" text,"outgoing_token" text,"minimum_contract_payment" varchar(255),"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("name"))
CREATE TABLE "encumbrances" ("id" serial,"payment" varchar(255),"expiration" bigint,"end_at" timestamp with time zone,"oracles" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"access_key" text,"salt" text,"hashed_secret" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "heads" ("hash" varchar,"number" bigint NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("hash"))

CREATE TABLE "job_specs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"start_at" timestamp with time zone,"end_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "initiators" ("id" serial,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id),"type" text NOT NULL,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"schedule" text,"time" timestamp with time zone,"ran" boolean,"address" bytea,"requesters" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "job_runs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL,"result_id" integer,"run_request_id" integer,"status" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"finished_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"initiator_id" integer,"creation_height" varchar(255),"observed_height" varchar(255),"overrides_id" integer,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "keys" ("address" varchar(64),"json" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("address"))
CREATE TABLE "run_requests" ("id" serial,"request_id" text,"tx_hash" bytea,"requester" bytea,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "run_results" ("id" serial,"data" text,"status" text,"error_message" text,"amount" varchar(255) , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "service_agreements" ("id" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"encumbrance_id" integer,"request_body" text,"signature" varchar(255),"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "sessions" ("id" text,"last_used" timestamp with time zone,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "sync_events" ("id" bigserial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"body" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "task_runs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"job_run_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_runs(id) ON DELETE CASCADE NOT NULL,"result_id" integer,"status" text,"task_spec_id" integer,"minimum_confirmations" bigint,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "task_specs" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id),"type" text NOT NULL,"confirmations" bigint,"params" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "tx_attempts" ("hash" bytea NOT NULL,"tx_id" bigint,"gas_price" varchar(255),"confirmed" boolean,"hex" text,"sent_at" bigint,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("hash"))

CREATE TABLE "txes" ("id" bigserial,"from" bytea NOT NULL,"to" bytea NOT NULL,"data" bytea,"nonce" bigint,"value" varchar(255),"gas_limit" bigint,"hash" bytea,"gas_price" varchar(255),"confirmed" boolean,"hex" text,"sent_at" bigint , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "users" ("email" text,"hashed_password" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"token_key" text,"token_salt" text,"token_hashed_secret" text,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("email"))

CREATE TABLE "txes" ("id" bigserial,"surrogate_id" text UNIQUE,"from" bytea NOT NULL,"to" bytea NOT NULL,"data" bytea NOT NULL,"nonce" bigint NOT NULL,"value" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"gas_limit" bigint NOT NULL,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"gas_price" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"confirmed" boolean NOT NULL,"sent_at" bigint NOT NULL,"signed_raw_tx" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "tx_attempts" ("id" bigserial,"tx_id" bigint REFERENCES txes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,"created_at" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"gas_price" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"confirmed" boolean NOT NULL,"sent_at" bigint NOT NULL,"signed_raw_tx" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
ALTER TABLE "task_runs" ADD "confirmations" bigint NOT NULL  DEFAULT  0;
CREATE TABLE "heads" ("id" bigserial,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"number" bigint NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "link_earned" ("id" bigserial NOT NULL,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL,"job_run_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_runs(id) NOT NULL UNIQUE,"earned" varchar(255),"earned_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

INSERT INTO link_earned
		SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY job_spec_id) AS id, job_spec_id, jr.id AS job_run_id, amount, finished_at
		FROM job_runs jr INNER JOIN run_results rr ON jr.overrides_id  = rr.id
		WHERE amount IS NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE job_specs ADD min_payment varchar(255)

CREATE TABLE "configurations" ("id" bigserial,"name" text NOT NULL UNIQUE,"value" text NOT NULL,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

ALTER TABLE run_results DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS cached_job_run_id;
ALTER TABLE run_results DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS cached_task_run_id;

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"name" text,"url" text NOT NULL,"access_key" text NOT NULL,"salt" text NOT NULL,"hashed_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_token" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD name varchar(255)

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"name" text NOT NULL UNIQUE,"url" text NOT NULL,"access_key" text NOT NULL,"salt" text NOT NULL,"hashed_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_token" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "encumbrances" ("id" serial,"payment" varchar(255),"expiration" bigint,"end_at" timestamp with time zone,"oracles" text,"aggregator" text NOT NULL,"agg_initiate_job_selector" bytea NOT NULL,"agg_fulfill_selector" bytea NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"name" text NOT NULL UNIQUE,"url" text,"access_key" text NOT NULL,"salt" text NOT NULL,"hashed_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_token" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "polling_interval" BigInt;
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "idle_threshold" BigInt;
ALTER TABLE run_requests ADD request_params text NOT NULL DEFAULT '{}'

UPDATE run_requests
			SET request_params = job_runs.overrides
			FROM job_runs
			WHERE job_runs.run_request_id = run_requests.id AND job_runs.overrides IS NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE job_runs DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS overrides
CREATE TABLE "log_cursors" ("name" text,"initialized" boolean NOT NULL,"block_index" integer NOT NULL,"log_index" integer NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("name"))
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_task_runs_job_run_id ON task_runs(job_run_id);

DROP INDEX idx_job_runs_status;
	CREATE INDEX idx_job_runs_status ON job_runs(status) WHERE status != 'completed';
ALTER TABLE initiators ALTER COLUMN job_spec_id TYPE uuid USING job_spec_id::uuid;

DELETE FROM job_runs WHERE initiator_id IS NULL;
	ALTER TABLE job_runs ALTER COLUMN initiator_id SET NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "absolute_threshold" float;

-- where one of the txes is confirmed, keep the latest confirmed one
		-- if none are confirmed, keep the latest one
		WITH duplicate_txes_by_nonce AS (
			SELECT nonce, "from"
			FROM txes
			GROUP BY nonce, "from"
			HAVING count(id) > 1
		),
		txes_to_keep AS (
			SELECT DISTINCT ON (txes.nonce) txes.nonce, id, confirmed, txes."from"
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			ORDER BY nonce, "from", confirmed desc, id desc
		),
		txes_to_delete AS (
			SELECT id
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_keep)
		)
		DELETE FROM txes WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_delete);

		DROP INDEX idx_txes_nonce;
	  	CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_txes_unique_nonces_per_account ON txes(nonce, "from");

CREATE TABLE flux_monitor_round_stats (
            id bigserial primary key,
            aggregator bytea not null,
            round_id integer not null,
            num_new_round_logs integer not null default 0,
            num_submissions integer not null default 0,

            UNIQUE (aggregator, round_id)
        )
ALTER TABLE keys ADD COLUMN last_used timestamptz;

ALTER TABLE keys ALTER COLUMN next_nonce DROP NOT NULL;
		ALTER TABLE keys ALTER COLUMN next_nonce SET DEFAULT NULL;
ALTER TABLE flux_monitor_round_stats ADD COLUMN "job_run_id" uuid REFERENCES job_runs(id) ON DELETE CASCADE;

ALTER TABLE log_consumptions
ADD COLUMN block_number BIGINT
CREATE INDEX idx_eth_txes_min_unconfirmed_nonce_for_key ON eth_txes (nonce, from_address) WHERE state = 'unconfirmed';

			id bytea PRIMARY KEY,
			on_chain_signing_address bytea NOT NULL,
			off_chain_public_key bytea NOT NULL,
			encrypted_private_keys jsonb NOT NULL,
			created_at timestamptz NOT NULL,
			updated_at timestamptz NOT NULL
			);

CREATE TABLE migrations (id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY)

CREATE TABLE "heads" ("hash" varchar,"number" bigint NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("hash"))

CREATE TABLE "initiators" ("id" serial,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id),"type" text NOT NULL,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"schedule" text,"time" timestamp with time zone,"ran" boolean,"address" bytea,"requesters" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "job_runs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL,"result_id" integer,"run_request_id" integer,"status" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"finished_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"initiator_id" integer,"creation_height" varchar(255),"observed_height" varchar(255),"overrides_id" integer,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "keys" ("address" varchar(64),"json" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("address"))
CREATE TABLE "run_requests" ("id" serial,"request_id" text,"tx_hash" bytea,"requester" bytea,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "run_results" ("id" serial,"data" text,"status" text,"error_message" text,"amount" varchar(255) , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "service_agreements" ("id" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"encumbrance_id" integer,"request_body" text,"signature" varchar(255),"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "sessions" ("id" text,"last_used" timestamp with time zone,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "sync_events" ("id" bigserial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"body" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "task_runs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"job_run_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_runs(id) ON DELETE CASCADE NOT NULL,"result_id" integer,"status" text,"task_spec_id" integer,"minimum_confirmations" bigint,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "task_specs" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id),"type" text NOT NULL,"confirmations" bigint,"params" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "tx_attempts" ("hash" bytea NOT NULL,"tx_id" bigint,"gas_price" varchar(255),"confirmed" boolean,"hex" text,"sent_at" bigint,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("hash"))

CREATE TABLE "txes" ("id" bigserial,"from" bytea NOT NULL,"to" bytea NOT NULL,"data" bytea,"nonce" bigint,"value" varchar(255),"gas_limit" bigint,"hash" bytea,"gas_price" varchar(255),"confirmed" boolean,"hex" text,"sent_at" bigint , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "users" ("email" text,"hashed_password" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"token_key" text,"token_salt" text,"token_hashed_secret" text,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("email"))

CREATE TABLE "txes" ("id" bigserial,"surrogate_id" text UNIQUE,"from" bytea NOT NULL,"to" bytea NOT NULL,"data" bytea NOT NULL,"nonce" bigint NOT NULL,"value" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"gas_limit" bigint NOT NULL,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"gas_price" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"confirmed" boolean NOT NULL,"sent_at" bigint NOT NULL,"signed_raw_tx" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "tx_attempts" ("id" bigserial,"tx_id" bigint REFERENCES txes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,"created_at" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"gas_price" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"confirmed" boolean NOT NULL,"sent_at" bigint NOT NULL,"signed_raw_tx" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
ALTER TABLE "task_runs" ADD "confirmations" bigint NOT NULL  DEFAULT  0;
CREATE TABLE "heads" ("id" bigserial,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"number" bigint NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "link_earned" ("id" bigserial NOT NULL,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL,"job_run_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_runs(id) NOT NULL UNIQUE,"earned" varchar(255),"earned_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

INSERT INTO link_earned
		SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY job_spec_id) AS id, job_spec_id, jr.id AS job_run_id, amount, finished_at
		FROM job_runs jr INNER JOIN run_results rr ON jr.overrides_id  = rr.id
		WHERE amount IS NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE job_specs ADD min_payment varchar(255)

ALTER TABLE initiators ALTER COLUMN job_spec_id TYPE uuid USING job_spec_id::uuid;

DELETE FROM job_runs WHERE initiator_id IS NULL;
	ALTER TABLE job_runs ALTER COLUMN initiator_id SET NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "absolute_threshold" float;

-- where one of the txes is confirmed, keep the latest confirmed one
		-- if none are confirmed, keep the latest one
		WITH duplicate_txes_by_nonce AS (
			SELECT nonce, "from"
			FROM txes
			GROUP BY nonce, "from"
			HAVING count(id) > 1
		),
		txes_to_keep AS (
			SELECT DISTINCT ON (txes.nonce) txes.nonce, id, confirmed, txes."from"
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			ORDER BY nonce, "from", confirmed desc, id desc
		),
		txes_to_delete AS (
			SELECT id
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_keep)
		)
		DELETE FROM txes WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_delete);

		DROP INDEX idx_txes_nonce;
	  	CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_txes_unique_nonces_per_account ON txes(nonce, "from");

INSERT INTO link_earned

		WHERE amount IS NOT NULL

-- where one of the txes is confirmed, keep the latest confirmed one
		-- if none are confirmed, keep the latest one
		WITH duplicate_txes_by_nonce AS (
			SELECT nonce, "from"
			FROM txes
			GROUP BY nonce, "from"
			HAVING count(id) > 1
		),
		txes_to_keep AS (
			SELECT DISTINCT ON (txes.nonce) txes.nonce, id, confirmed, txes."from"
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			ORDER BY nonce, "from", confirmed desc, id desc
		),
		txes_to_delete AS (
			SELECT id
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_keep)
		)
		DELETE FROM txes WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_delete);

		DROP INDEX idx_txes_nonce;
	  	CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_txes_unique_nonces_per_account ON txes(nonce, "from");

INSERT INTO link_earned
		SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY job_spec_id) AS id, job_spec_id, jr.id AS job_run_id, amount, finished_at
		FROM job_runs jr INNER JOIN run_results rr ON jr.overrides_id  = rr.id
		WHERE amount IS NOT NULL

-- where one of the txes is confirmed, keep the latest confirmed one
		-- if none are confirmed, keep the latest one
		WITH duplicate_txes_by_nonce AS (
			SELECT nonce, "from"
			FROM txes
			GROUP BY nonce, "from"
			HAVING count(id) > 1
		),
		txes_to_keep AS (
			SELECT DISTINCT ON (txes.nonce) txes.nonce, id, confirmed, txes."from"
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			ORDER BY nonce, "from", confirmed desc, id desc
		),
		txes_to_delete AS (
			SELECT id
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_keep)
		)
		DELETE FROM txes WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_delete);

		DROP INDEX idx_txes_nonce;
	  	CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_txes_unique_nonces_per_account ON txes(nonce, "from");

msg: Locking postgres for exclusive access with 500ms timeout
CREATE TABLE migrations (id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY)

CREATE TABLE "bridge_types" ("name" text,"url" text,"confirmations" bigint,"incoming_token_hash" text,"salt" text,"outgoing_token" text,"minimum_contract_payment" varchar(255),"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("name"))
CREATE TABLE "encumbrances" ("id" serial,"payment" varchar(255),"expiration" bigint,"end_at" timestamp with time zone,"oracles" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"access_key" text,"salt" text,"hashed_secret" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "heads" ("hash" varchar,"number" bigint NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("hash"))

CREATE TABLE "job_specs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"start_at" timestamp with time zone,"end_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "initiators" ("id" serial,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id),"type" text NOT NULL,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"schedule" text,"time" timestamp with time zone,"ran" boolean,"address" bytea,"requesters" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "job_runs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL,"result_id" integer,"run_request_id" integer,"status" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"finished_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"initiator_id" integer,"creation_height" varchar(255),"observed_height" varchar(255),"overrides_id" integer,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "keys" ("address" varchar(64),"json" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("address"))
CREATE TABLE "run_requests" ("id" serial,"request_id" text,"tx_hash" bytea,"requester" bytea,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "run_results" ("id" serial,"data" text,"status" text,"error_message" text,"amount" varchar(255) , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "service_agreements" ("id" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"encumbrance_id" integer,"request_body" text,"signature" varchar(255),"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "sessions" ("id" text,"last_used" timestamp with time zone,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "sync_events" ("id" bigserial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"body" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "task_runs" ("id" text NOT NULL,"job_run_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_runs(id) ON DELETE CASCADE NOT NULL,"result_id" integer,"status" text,"task_spec_id" integer,"minimum_confirmations" bigint,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "task_specs" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id),"type" text NOT NULL,"confirmations" bigint,"params" text , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "tx_attempts" ("hash" bytea NOT NULL,"tx_id" bigint,"gas_price" varchar(255),"confirmed" boolean,"hex" text,"sent_at" bigint,"created_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("hash"))

CREATE TABLE "txes" ("id" bigserial,"from" bytea NOT NULL,"to" bytea NOT NULL,"data" bytea,"nonce" bigint,"value" varchar(255),"gas_limit" bigint,"hash" bytea,"gas_price" varchar(255),"confirmed" boolean,"hex" text,"sent_at" bigint , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "users" ("email" text,"hashed_password" text,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"token_key" text,"token_salt" text,"token_hashed_secret" text,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("email"))

CREATE TABLE "txes" ("id" bigserial,"surrogate_id" text UNIQUE,"from" bytea NOT NULL,"to" bytea NOT NULL,"data" bytea NOT NULL,"nonce" bigint NOT NULL,"value" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"gas_limit" bigint NOT NULL,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"gas_price" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"confirmed" boolean NOT NULL,"sent_at" bigint NOT NULL,"signed_raw_tx" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "tx_attempts" ("id" bigserial,"tx_id" bigint REFERENCES txes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,"created_at" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"gas_price" varchar(78) NOT NULL,"confirmed" boolean NOT NULL,"sent_at" bigint NOT NULL,"signed_raw_tx" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
ALTER TABLE "task_runs" ADD "confirmations" bigint NOT NULL  DEFAULT  0;
CREATE TABLE "heads" ("id" bigserial,"hash" bytea NOT NULL,"number" bigint NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "link_earned" ("id" bigserial NOT NULL,"job_spec_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_specs(id) NOT NULL,"job_run_id" varchar(36) REFERENCES job_runs(id) NOT NULL UNIQUE,"earned" varchar(255),"earned_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

INSERT INTO link_earned
		SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY job_spec_id) AS id, job_spec_id, jr.id AS job_run_id, amount, finished_at
		FROM job_runs jr INNER JOIN run_results rr ON jr.overrides_id  = rr.id
		WHERE amount IS NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE job_specs ADD min_payment varchar(255)

CREATE TABLE "configurations" ("id" bigserial,"name" text NOT NULL UNIQUE,"value" text NOT NULL,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

ALTER TABLE run_results DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS cached_job_run_id;
ALTER TABLE run_results DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS cached_task_run_id;

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"name" text,"url" text NOT NULL,"access_key" text NOT NULL,"salt" text NOT NULL,"hashed_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_token" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD name varchar(255)

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"name" text NOT NULL UNIQUE,"url" text NOT NULL,"access_key" text NOT NULL,"salt" text NOT NULL,"hashed_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_token" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "encumbrances" ("id" serial,"payment" varchar(255),"expiration" bigint,"end_at" timestamp with time zone,"oracles" text,"aggregator" text NOT NULL,"agg_initiate_job_selector" bytea NOT NULL,"agg_fulfill_selector" bytea NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "external_initiators" ("id" serial,"created_at" timestamp with time zone,"updated_at" timestamp with time zone,"deleted_at" timestamp with time zone,"name" text NOT NULL UNIQUE,"url" text,"access_key" text NOT NULL,"salt" text NOT NULL,"hashed_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_secret" text NOT NULL,"outgoing_token" text NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("id"))
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "polling_interval" BigInt;
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "idle_threshold" BigInt;
ALTER TABLE run_requests ADD request_params text NOT NULL DEFAULT '{}'

UPDATE run_requests
			SET request_params = job_runs.overrides
			FROM job_runs
			WHERE job_runs.run_request_id = run_requests.id AND job_runs.overrides IS NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE job_runs DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS overrides
CREATE TABLE "log_cursors" ("name" text,"initialized" boolean NOT NULL,"block_index" integer NOT NULL,"log_index" integer NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ("name"))
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_task_runs_job_run_id ON task_runs(job_run_id);

DROP INDEX idx_job_runs_status;
	CREATE INDEX idx_job_runs_status ON job_runs(status) WHERE status != 'completed';
ALTER TABLE initiators ALTER COLUMN job_spec_id TYPE uuid USING job_spec_id::uuid;

DELETE FROM job_runs WHERE initiator_id IS NULL;
	ALTER TABLE job_runs ALTER COLUMN initiator_id SET NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE initiators ADD COLUMN "absolute_threshold" float;

-- where one of the txes is confirmed, keep the latest confirmed one
		-- if none are confirmed, keep the latest one
		WITH duplicate_txes_by_nonce AS (
			SELECT nonce, "from"
			FROM txes
			GROUP BY nonce, "from"
			HAVING count(id) > 1
		),
		txes_to_keep AS (
			SELECT DISTINCT ON (txes.nonce) txes.nonce, id, confirmed, txes."from"
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			ORDER BY nonce, "from", confirmed desc, id desc
		),
		txes_to_delete AS (
			SELECT id
			FROM txes
			JOIN duplicate_txes_by_nonce
			ON duplicate_txes_by_nonce.nonce = txes.nonce
			AND duplicate_txes_by_nonce.from = txes.from
			WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_keep)
		)
		DELETE FROM txes WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM txes_to_delete);

		DROP INDEX idx_txes_nonce;
	  	CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_txes_unique_nonces_per_account ON txes(nonce, "from");

CREATE TABLE flux_monitor_round_stats (
            id bigserial primary key,
            aggregator bytea not null,
            round_id integer not null,
            num_new_round_logs integer not null default 0,
            num_submissions integer not null default 0,

            UNIQUE (aggregator, round_id)
        )
ALTER TABLE keys ADD COLUMN last_used timestamptz;

ALTER TABLE keys ALTER COLUMN next_nonce DROP NOT NULL;
		ALTER TABLE keys ALTER COLUMN next_nonce SET DEFAULT NULL;
ALTER TABLE flux_monitor_round_stats ADD COLUMN "job_run_id" uuid REFERENCES job_runs(id) ON DELETE CASCADE;

ALTER TABLE log_consumptions
ADD COLUMN block_number BIGINT
CREATE INDEX idx_eth_txes_min_unconfirmed_nonce_for_key ON eth_txes (nonce, from_address) WHERE state = 'unconfirmed';

			off_chain_public_key bytea NOT NULL,
			encrypted_private_keys jsonb NOT NULL,
			created_at timestamptz NOT NULL,
			updated_at timestamptz NOT NULL
			);
